sub_title: Senior Manager, EMEA Sales Planning at ServiceNow
summary:
4 years of experience in geo Sales Planning and Operations, partnering with sales leaders, HR /talent and sales compensation teams

1.5 years of experience in Field Sales Operations at ServiceNow Nederland BV providing support and consultancy to the sales force around transactions, forecasting process and commercial policy compliance.

6+ years of experience in Sales Operations and Analysis for multi million annual budgets HP EMEA Global Accounts. Specialist in business analysis with focus on planning activities (target setting process, guidelines design and consultancy, acting as a liaison between local sales strategy and planning decision factors), sales forecasting and pipeline management covering full HP product and solution portfolio, key performance indicators tracking and decomposition.

1.5 years of experience in networking and communications field as electronic engineer, transports and telecommunications.

Experienced in working within an international environment, tight collaboration with Senior Roles and different functions such as Sales Directors, Finance Managers and Sales Strategy and Planning.
Experienced in coordinating stream-works and collaboration between teams managing different ends of processes and tools for successful planning cycles.
People and numbers person, very professional and structured, ambitious and outcome oriented, highly adaptable to changes, with strong demonstrated leadership skills. 

Specific competencies:
•	Initiative and pro-activity
•	Will to win
•	Always accountable
•	Communication skills
•	Continuous improvement mentality
•	Leadership and Organizational awareness
•	Team coordination
•	Teamwork
•	Fluent in English and Spanish

publications.name: A Comparative Assessment of Traffic Control Parameters within an UTC Distributed System

authors.headline: Senior Manager, EMEA Sales Planning at ServiceNow
Vice-Dean Research & International Relations at Transport Faculty, University POLITEHNICA of Bucharest

Head of Computer Science and Engineering department.
Associate Professor.
University Jaume I

profile_positions.description:
Team coordination
Manage E2E EMEA Sales Planning covering sales headcount, quotas, commissions and spend
Sales Planning and Commissions guidance to sales organization
Drive planning reviews based, monitor execution and report to Global management on a regular basis
Represent EMEA in cross-functional Planning process and system enhancements
Commissions escalations, recommend solutions and support decision
Actively participate and influence Planning and Commissions relevant platforms, reporting solutions and innovations aligned to current business goals
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager, EMEA Sales Planning

profile_positions.description:
Manage the multi year business planning process for the EMEA Sales Organization with primary focus on design and execution of the annual sales planning process
Drive planning reviews based on key sales performance indicators
Monitor progress and report to management on a regular basis
Represent EMEA in driving cross-functional process and system enhancements
Oversee and drive process improvements.
profile_positions.title: Manager, EMEA Sales Planning and Analysis

profile_positions.description:
• Support and advise the sales force in the sales transaction and forecasting process
• Suggest pricing and payment solutions balancing customer need and pricing policies
• Review Quotes and Order Forms for accuracy and completeness
• Interface to Deal Desk, Finance and Legal as needed (i.e. revenue recognition)
profile_positions.title: Sales Operations Specialist

profile_positions.description:
•	Applying experience and subject matter knowledge to solve common and complex business issues within established guidelines and recommending appropriate alternatives.
•	Delivering decomposition of the Sales Productivity, Coverage, Quota Deployment and Readiness data with in-depth root cause analysis in case of outcomes not meeting the targets
•	Representing the needs of the business during process improvement projects
•	Collaborating with operational teams and business stakeholders to gather business requirements, supporting the design of new or improved processes 
•	Supporting processes/programs that impact multiple business units and/or countries
•	Driving the implementation of agreed improvement actions, initiatives and projects
profile_positions.title: EG EMEA Sales Strategy and Planning

profile_positions.description:
•	Business analysis and support for the Southern Europe Global Accounts management and lead for the local support team (+6 people team coordination)
•	Acting as a trusted partner, providing relevant advice to the Southern Europe Global Accounts VP and Sales Directors in managing all activities that enable sales productivity and profitability by leveraging efficient and scalable frameworks and processes (total addressable market, share of wallet, account business plan, account business target, business reviews, end to end forecast monitoring and calls).
•	Calculating, reviewing and analyzing business performance indicators, sales trends and other sales data related decomposition, providing recommendations as appropriate
•	Supporting the sub-region Sales Forecasting process (Salesforce.com data analysis and consolidation, active participation in EMEA forecast reviews)
•	Handling complex revenue monitoring activities
•	Collaborating closely with Finance Managers, Business Unit Managers and Account General Managers
Driving continuous improvement by advocating for change and describing expected positive outcomes to others
Subject matter expert role on Readiness process (planning cycle for next fiscal year) and Qlikview reporting tool
•	Redesigning the Salesforce.com reporting platform tailored for Global Accounts specific requirements
profile_positions.title: Southern Europe Global Accounts - Senior Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Part of Carrefour, Renault-Nissan, AXA, Air France-KLM and General Electric Global Account core team. 
•	Collaborating with the Account General Managers in order to increase sales productivity by managing the operations portfolio. Act as the liaison between account world-wide sales team and account management by coordinating business financial activities, forecasting, sales compensation, CRM consultancy and account planning.

Specific activities:
- World-wide account business data analysis and consolidation
- End to end Sales Forecasting covering data for more than 10 countries 
- Pipeline management and data quality monitoring (using CRM systems: Siebel, Salesforce.com)
- Account Business Planning and Account Business Target support and process coordination inside the account team
- Manual claiming at account level 
- Ensure the account structure is reflected accurately in HP internal systems
- Participation in account team meetings with presentations on any of the above topics
profile_positions.title: Global Accounts - Business Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Coordinating the ESSN Territory sales operations activities: Pipeline management, Smart Quote follow-up, Pricing activities 
•	Strong knowledge of CRM and pricing tools (Siebel, Eclipse, Smart Portal)
profile_positions.title: ESSN MidMarket Territory Sales Support Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Configuring networking equipment both in testing and production environment 
•	Active participation in designing network architectures and providing effective and profitable solutions to meet customer requirements 
•	Technology services and support in maintaining network availability and business continuity for the following projects:
        - BTMS (Bucharest Traffic Management System) 
        - ANRCTI – localization and portability of phone numbers
profile_positions.title: System Engineer
